tasks.name: Full or Incremental ingestion
tasks.description: Ingest high volume raw data from a variety of sources into the bronze data storage.

tasks.name: Bronze Layer
tasks.description: Capture the unprocessed raw data in its original format in bronze layer.

tasks.name: Process Bronze Layer
tasks.description: Process, clean, and transform the raw data to ensure data quality.

tasks.name: Silver data
tasks.description: Store the more organized and validated data in silver layer.

tasks.name: Fabric Metadata driven Framework
tasks.description: Ingest batch and real-time data into a single location within your Fabric workspace.

tasks.name: Data Landingzone
tasks.description: Organize, query, and store your ingested data in an easily retrievable format.

tasks.name: Process Silver Layer
tasks.description: Clean, transform, extract, and load your data for analysis and modeling tasks.

tasks.name: Audit and Logging
tasks.description: Organize, query, and store your ingested data in an easily retrievable format.

tasks.name: Metadata (Fabric Database)
tasks.description: Organize, query, and store your ingested data in an easily retrievable format.

tasks.name: Data Validation-Cleansing
tasks.description: Clean, transform, extract, and load your data for analysis and modeling tasks.

name: Medallion
description: Organize data in a lakehouse or warehouse while progressively improving its structure and quality through each layer, from Bronze to Silver to Gold, resulting in high-quality data that is easy to analyze.
